price: Hakika Sisi tukawapelekea kimbunga cha vijiwe, isipo kuwa wafuasi wa Lut'i. Hao tuliwaokoa karibu na alfajiri.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٖۖ نَّجَّيۡنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٖ
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tuliwapelekea upepo mkali wa kuwatupia changarawe. Isipo kuwa watu wa Lut'i walio amini. Hao tuliwaokoa na adhabu hii mwisho wa usiku.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ʿalayhim ḥāṣiban illā āla lūṭin najjaynāhum bisaḥarin
